item.title: Kidnapped Evidence
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Joseph J. Millard)
item.description: Private detective Sam McGee was on the run, again. This time with the dead body of Jonathan Mainwaring. Can he outwit the cops and unmask the real killers before heâ€™s sent to the hot seat for murder?
